name: Symphony of Blood
summary: You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor.
description:
You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor. Once per day, you can cast vampiric exsanguination as a 7th-level divine innate spell.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
